title: Low Priority Queue
body: Does anybody else think that it is crap to receive a punishment if your internet had disconnected? I mean it's understandable if you actually leave a game willingly, but In my case, I have received 2 now and have to wait 10 mins before I can queue. Not every bodies internet connection works at all times of everyday.

replies.body: I could play like 10 games in a row solid and absolutely no issues and then I'll have one game where the connection to riot servers is shite. Meanwhile all other server connections are perfectly fine.

That's not the issue. Your internet is failing consistently enough for you to get hit with LPQ not once but twice. LPQ takes into account that peoples internet might fail on occasion but you've exceeded that exception. Your internet isn't meeting the connection requirements of the game.

> Does anybody else think that it is crap to receive a punishment if your internet had disconnected?

Well if your internet is that bad to cause *consistent* disconnections you shouldn't be playing a game that requires a stable connection. In fact by doing so you're breaking Riots TOU and EULA.

Whether your internet disconnects or you leave willingly....its the exact same thing. You've left the game. Your team now has a disadvantage. Fix your internet or suck it up, you're letting down your team.
